casebody.head_matter:
Oxford Industrial Corporation v. Heffernan, Appellant.
Argued January 5, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Thomas A. Reap, Jr., with him Cormac J. Malloy, for appellants.
David II. Hubert, for appellee.
March 15, 1968:
